a /a5/
■ modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
ā /a1/
1. interjection of surprise; Ah!; Oh!
2. prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity; used in transliteration; also pr. »à«
3. actinium (chemistry)
4. (used in transliterating chemical names)
Ā /A1/
■ abbr. for country names that begin with »ā«: Algeria »Ā'ěrjílìyà«, Afghanistan »Āfùhàn« etc
Ābā /A1 ba1/*
■ Aba, southeast Nigerian city; Aba, the Lisu word for grandfather
Ābāgāqí /A1 ba1 ga1 qi2/*
■ Abag banner or Avga khoshuu in Xilingol League »Xīlínguōlè Méng«, Inner Mongolia
Ābālāqìyà /A1 ba1 la1 qi4 ya4/*
■ Appalachian Mountains in North America
Ābāsī /A1 ba1 si1/*
■ Abbas (name); Mahmoud Abbas (1935-), also called Abu Mazen, Palestinian leader, Chairman of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) from 2005
Ābásī Wángcháo /A1 ba2 si1 Wang2 chao2/*
■ Abbasid Empire (750-1258), successor of the Umayyad caliphate
ābà /a1 ba4/*
■ (dialect) father
Ābà /A1 ba4/*
1. Abba (Aramaic word father); by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
2. see »Ābà Zàngzú Qiāngzú Zìzhìzhōu«; see »Ābà Xiàn«

āi /ai1/
1. hey!; (interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
2. interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!); to sigh
3. in order; in sequence
4. close to; adjacent to
5. dust; dirt; angstrom; phonetic ai or e
6. (bound form) sorrow; grief; pity
7. (bound form) to grieve for; to pity; to lament; to condole
8. (indicating response); (sadly sighing); also pr. »èi«
9. einsteinium (chemistry)
10. see »āijiě«, father's mother; granny (dialect); respectful form of address for older lady
āi /ai1/
āiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. hey!; (interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
2. interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!); to sigh
3. in order; in sequence
4. close to; adjacent to
5. dust; dirt; angstrom; phonetic ai or e
6. (bound form) sorrow; grief; pity
7. (bound form) to grieve for; to pity; to lament; to condole
8. (indicating response); (sadly sighing); also pr. »èi«
9. einsteinium (chemistry)
10. see »āijiě«, father's mother; granny (dialect); respectful form of address for older lady
āi /ai1/
āile, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. hey!; (interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
2. interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!); to sigh
3. in order; in sequence
4. close to; adjacent to
5. dust; dirt; angstrom; phonetic ai or e
6. (bound form) sorrow; grief; pity
7. (bound form) to grieve for; to pity; to lament; to condole
8. (indicating response); (sadly sighing); also pr. »èi«
9. einsteinium (chemistry)
10. see »āijiě«, father's mother; granny (dialect); respectful form of address for older lady
Āi /Ai1/
1. abbr. for Egypt »Āijí« or Ethiopia »Āisài'ébǐyà«
2. Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors »Yándì« descended from Shennong »Shénnóng« Farmer God, also known as Li »Lí«
āibiān /ai1 bian1/*
■ to keep close to the edge; near the mark; close to (the true figure); relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)
āibiān /ai1 bian1/*
āibiānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to keep close to the edge; near the mark; close to (the true figure); relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)
āibiān /ai1 bian1/*
āibiānguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to keep close to the edge; near the mark; close to (the true figure); relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)
āibiān /ai1 bian1/*
āibiānle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to keep close to the edge; near the mark; close to (the true figure); relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)

āiháo /ai1 hao2/*
1. to cry piteously; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
2. to howl in grief; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
āiháo /ai1 hao2/*
āiháozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to cry piteously; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
2. to howl in grief; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
āiháo /ai1 hao2/*
āiháoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to cry piteously; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
2. to howl in grief; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
āiháo /ai1 hao2/*
āiháole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to cry piteously; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«
2. to howl in grief; anguished wailing; same as »āiháo«

ān /an1/
1. (bound form) calm; peaceful
2. to calm; to set at ease
3. safe; secure; in good health
4. content; satisfied (as in »ānyú«)
5. to place (sb) in a suitable position (job)
6. to install; to fix; to fit
7. to bring (a charge against sb)
8. to harbor (certain intentions)
9. ampere (abbr. for »ānpéi«)
10. ammonia
11. (bound form) saddle
12. to be versed in; to know well
13. hut; small temple; nunnery
14. Eucalyptus globulus; Taiwan pr. »àn«
15. container
16. small Buddhist temple
ān /an1/
ānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (bound form) calm; peaceful
2. to calm; to set at ease
3. safe; secure; in good health
4. content; satisfied (as in »ānyú«)
5. to place (sb) in a suitable position (job)
6. to install; to fix; to fit
7. to bring (a charge against sb)
8. to harbor (certain intentions)
9. ampere (abbr. for »ānpéi«)
10. ammonia
11. (bound form) saddle
12. to be versed in; to know well
13. hut; small temple; nunnery
14. Eucalyptus globulus; Taiwan pr. »àn«
15. container
16. small Buddhist temple
ān /an1/
ānguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) calm; peaceful
2. to calm; to set at ease
3. safe; secure; in good health
4. content; satisfied (as in »ānyú«)
5. to place (sb) in a suitable position (job)
6. to install; to fix; to fit
7. to bring (a charge against sb)
8. to harbor (certain intentions)
9. ampere (abbr. for »ānpéi«)
10. ammonia
11. (bound form) saddle
12. to be versed in; to know well
13. hut; small temple; nunnery
14. Eucalyptus globulus; Taiwan pr. »àn«
15. container
16. small Buddhist temple
ān /an1/
ānle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) calm; peaceful
2. to calm; to set at ease
3. safe; secure; in good health
4. content; satisfied (as in »ānyú«)
5. to place (sb) in a suitable position (job)
6. to install; to fix; to fit
7. to bring (a charge against sb)
8. to harbor (certain intentions)

á /a2/
■ interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer; Eh?; what?
ái /ai2/
1. to suffer; to endure
2. to pull through (hard times)
3. to delay; to stall; to play for time; to dawdle
4. cancer; (esp.) carcinoma
5. to growl (of dog); to bare fangs
6. able (in administrating); to govern forcefully
7. (literary) white as snow
8. stupid; idiotic
ái /ai2/
áizhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to suffer; to endure
2. to pull through (hard times)
3. to delay; to stall; to play for time; to dawdle
4. cancer; (esp.) carcinoma
5. to growl (of dog); to bare fangs
6. able (in administrating); to govern forcefully
7. (literary) white as snow
8. stupid; idiotic
ái /ai2/
áiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to suffer; to endure
2. to pull through (hard times)
3. to delay; to stall; to play for time; to dawdle
4. cancer; (esp.) carcinoma
5. to growl (of dog); to bare fangs
6. able (in administrating); to govern forcefully
7. (literary) white as snow
8. stupid; idiotic
ái /ai2/
áile, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to suffer; to endure
2. to pull through (hard times)
3. to delay; to stall; to play for time; to dawdle
4. cancer; (esp.) carcinoma
5. to growl (of dog); to bare fangs
6. able (in administrating); to govern forcefully
7. (literary) white as snow
8. stupid; idiotic

àn /an4/
1. to press; to push; to leave aside or shelve; to control; to restrain; to keep one's hand on; to check or refer to; according to; in the light of; (of an editor or author) to make a comment
2. (legal) case; incident; record; file; table
3. dark
4. to turn dark
5. secret; hidden
6. (literary) confused; ignorant
7. (literary) to close (a door); to eclipse; confused; ignorant; dark
8. bank; shore; beach; coast
9. (chemistry) amine; colloquial pr. »ān«; Taiwan pr. »ān«
10. jail
11. (bound form) dark; dull (color); dim; gloomy

7. spot; colored patch; stripe; spotted; striped; variegated
8. to pull; to turn (sth) around; to turn around (a situation); to recoup
9. to promulgate; to send out; to issue; to grant or confer
10. abnormal pigment deposit on the skin
11. mark; scar on the skin
12. variegated; striped; marbled
bān /ban1/
bānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to move (i.e. relocate oneself); to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky); to shift; to copy indiscriminately
2. team; class; grade
3. (military) squad
4. work shift
5. classifier for groups of people and scheduled transport vehicles
6. sort; kind; class; way; manner
7. spot; colored patch; stripe; spotted; striped; variegated
8. to pull; to turn (sth) around; to turn around (a situation); to recoup
9. to promulgate; to send out; to issue; to grant or confer
10. abnormal pigment deposit on the skin
11. mark; scar on the skin
12. variegated; striped; marbled
bān /ban1/

bāo /bao1/
1. to cover; to wrap; to hold; to include; to take charge of; to contract (to or for); package; wrapper; container; bag; to hold or embrace; bundle; packet; CL: gè, zhī
2. to peel; to skin; to shell; to shuck
3. to sauté; to fry; to dry by heating
4. to cook slowly over a low flame; pot; saucepan
5. bud; flower calyx; luxuriant; profuse
6. spore
7. placenta; womb; born of the same parents
8. to praise; to commend; to honor; (of clothes) large or loose
9. a kind of grass (old)
10. to praise
11. (of a bucktooth) to protrude; to stick out

bá /ba2/
1. to pull up; to pull out; to draw out by suction; to select; to pick; to stand out (above level); to surpass; to seize
2. betel
3. (literary) beautiful woman
4. postscript; to trek across mountains
5. sacrifice
6. drought demon
bá /ba2/
bázhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to pull up; to pull out; to draw out by suction; to select; to pick; to stand out (above level); to surpass; to seize
2. betel
3. (literary) beautiful woman
4. postscript; to trek across mountains
5. sacrifice
6. drought demon
bá /ba2/
báguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to pull up; to pull out; to draw out by suction; to select; to pick; to stand out (above level); to surpass; to seize
2. betel
3. (literary) beautiful woman
4. postscript; to trek across mountains
5. sacrifice
6. drought demon
bá /ba2/
bále, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to pull up; to pull out; to draw out by suction; to select; to pick; to stand out (above level); to surpass; to seize
2. betel
3. (literary) beautiful woman
4. postscript; to trek across mountains
5. sacrifice
6. drought demon

bǎ /ba3/
1. to hold; to grasp; to hold a baby in position to help it urinate or defecate; handlebar; classifier: handful, bundle, bunch; classifier for things with handles; (used to put the object before the verb: »bǎ« + {noun} + {verb})
2. target; mark
3. palladium (chemistry); Taiwan pr. »bā«
4. (dialect) poo; (dialect) to shit
bǎ /ba3/
bǎzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to hold; to grasp; to hold a baby in position to help it urinate or defecate; handlebar; classifier: handful, bundle, bunch; classifier for things with handles; (used to put the object before the verb: »bǎ« + {noun} + {verb})
2. target; mark
3. palladium (chemistry); Taiwan pr. »bā«
4. (dialect) poo; (dialect) to shit
bǎ /ba3/
bǎguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to hold; to grasp; to hold a baby in position to help it urinate or defecate; handlebar; classifier: handful, bundle, bunch; classifier for things with handles; (used to put the object before the verb: »bǎ« + {noun} + {verb})
2. target; mark
3. palladium (chemistry); Taiwan pr. »bā«
4. (dialect) poo; (dialect) to shit
bǎ /ba3/
bǎle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to hold; to grasp; to hold a baby in position to help it urinate or defecate; handlebar; classifier: handful, bundle, bunch; classifier for things with handles; (used to put the object before the verb: »bǎ« + {noun} + {verb})
2. target; mark
3. palladium (chemistry); Taiwan pr. »bā«
4. (dialect) poo; (dialect) to shit

■ hectogram (old) (single-character equivalent of »bǎikè«)
Bǎikèlái /Bai3 ke4 lai2/*

bǎilàn /bai3lan4/

bǎilàn /bai3lan4/
bǎilànguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

bǎilàn /bai3lan4/

9. sampan

bà /ba4/
1. handle
2. father; dad; pa; papa
3. to stop; to cease; to dismiss; to suspend; to quit; to finish
4. hegemon; tyrant; lord; feudal chief; to rule by force; to usurp; (in modern advertising) master
5. a hoe; to harrow
6. dam
7. dike; embankment; CL: tiáo
8. plow
9. the part of a bow grasped when shooting
10. handle or shaft (of an axe etc); hoe; to harrow
11. dog with short shinbone
12. (bound form) Spanish mackerel

bài /bai4/
1. to bow to; to pay one's respects; (bound form) to extend greetings (on a specific occasion); to make a courtesy call; (bound form) (of a monarch) to appoint sb to (a position) by performing a ceremony; to acknowledge sb as one's (master, godfather etc); (used before some verbs to indicate politeness)
2. (bound form) to chant (from Sanskrit "pāṭhaka")
3. to defeat; to damage; to lose (to an opponent); to fail; to wither
4. barnyard millet (Echinochloa crus-galli); Panicum crus-galli; (literary) insignificant; trivial
5. polished rice
6. bellows (for blowing air into a fire)
bài /bai4/

13. mud; slush; ooze

bàng /bang4/
1. stick; club; cudgel; smart; capable; strong; wonderful; classifier for legs of a relay race
2. scale (instrument for weighing); to weigh; (loanword) pound (unit of weight, about 454 grams); (printing) point (unit used to measure the size of type); (Tw) (printing) pound; ream weight (used to describe paper thickness)
3. pound (sterling) (loanword)
4. (literary) oar; (metonym) boat; (literary) to whip; to flog; Taiwan pr. »bèng«
5. near; approaching; to depend on; (slang) to have an intimate relationship with sb; Taiwan pr. »páng«, »bāng«, »bàng«
6. mussel; clam
7. to slander; to defame; to speak ill of
8. the edge; border of a field
9. (literary) to row (a boat)
10. (gem)
11. two boats fastened side by side
bàng /bang4/
bàngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. stick; club; cudgel; smart; capable; strong; wonderful; classifier for legs of a relay race
2. scale (instrument for weighing); to weigh; (loanword) pound (unit of weight, about 454 grams); (printing) point (unit used to measure the size of type); (Tw) (printing) pound; ream weight (used to describe paper thickness)
3. pound (sterling) (loanword)
4. (literary) oar; (metonym) boat; (literary) to whip; to flog; Taiwan pr. »bèng«
5. near; approaching; to depend on; (slang) to have an intimate relationship with sb; Taiwan pr. »páng«, »bāng«, »bàng«
6. mussel; clam
7. to slander; to defame; to speak ill of
8. the edge; border of a field
9. (literary) to row (a boat)
10. (gem)
11. two boats fastened side by side
bàng /bang4/
bàngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. stick; club; cudgel; smart; capable; strong; wonderful; classifier for legs of a relay race
2. scale (instrument for weighing); to weigh; (loanword) pound (unit of weight, about 454 grams); (printing) point (unit used to measure the size of type); (Tw) (printing) pound; ream weight (used to describe paper thickness)

5. near; approaching; to depend on; (slang) to have an intimate relationship with sb; Taiwan pr. »páng«, »bāng«, »bàng«
6. mussel; clam
7. to slander; to defame; to speak ill of
8. the edge; border of a field
9. (literary) to row (a boat)
10. (gem)
11. two boats fastened side by side
bàng /bang4/
bàngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

Běn Lādēng /Ben3 · La1 deng1/*
1. Osama bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda
2. (Osama) bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda
bèi /bei4/
1. quilt; to cover (with); (literary) to suffer (a misfortune); used to indicate passive voice (placed before the doer of the action like "by" in English passive-voice sentences, or, if the doer is not mentioned, before the verb); (since c. 2009) (sarcastic or jocular) used to indicate that the following word should be regarded as being in air quotes (as in »bèilǚyóu« to "go on a trip")
2. the back of a body or object; to turn one's back; to hide something from; to learn by heart; to recite from memory; (slang) unlucky; hard of hearing
3. (two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply
4. (bound form) to prepare; to equip
5. (literary) fully; completely
6. cowrie; shellfish; currency (archaic)
7. lifetime; generation; group of people; class; classifier for generations; (literary) classifier for people
8. to go against; to be contrary to; perverse; rebellious
9. barium (chemistry)
10. to dry over a fire; to bake
11. comet
12. to disobey; to stand back-to-back
13. exhausted
14. a legendary wolf; distressed; wretched
15. necklace
16. food for a journey; cakes
17. paper or cloth pasted together
18. name of a feudal state
19. to sharpen (a knife) on a stone or a strop
20. horse tack (articles of harness such as saddle and bridle)
21. to saddle a horse
bèi /bei4/
bèiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. quilt; to cover (with); (literary) to suffer (a misfortune); used to indicate passive voice (placed before the doer of the action like "by" in English passive-voice sentences, or, if the doer is not mentioned, before the verb); (since c. 2009) (sarcastic or jocular) used to indicate that the following word should be regarded as being in air quotes (as in »bèilǚyóu« to "go on a trip")
2. the back of a body or object; to turn one's back; to hide something from; to learn by heart; to recite from memory; (slang) unlucky; hard of hearing
3. (two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply
4. (bound form) to prepare; to equip
5. (literary) fully; completely
6. cowrie; shellfish; currency (archaic)
7. lifetime; generation; group of people; class; classifier for generations; (literary) classifier for people
8. to go against; to be contrary to; perverse; rebellious
9. barium (chemistry)
10. to dry over a fire; to bake
11. comet
12. to disobey; to stand back-to-back
13. exhausted
14. a legendary wolf; distressed; wretched
15. necklace
16. food for a journey; cakes
17. paper or cloth pasted together
18. name of a feudal state
19. to sharpen (a knife) on a stone or a strop
20. horse tack (articles of harness such as saddle and bridle)
21. to saddle a horse
bèi /bei4/
bèile, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. quilt; to cover (with); (literary) to suffer (a misfortune); used to indicate passive voice (placed before the doer of the action like "by" in English passive-voice sentences, or, if the doer is not mentioned, before the verb); (since c. 2009) (sarcastic or jocular) used to indicate that the following word should be regarded as being in air quotes (as in »bèilǚyóu« to "go on a trip")
2. the back of a body or object; to turn one's back; to hide something from; to learn by heart; to recite from memory; (slang) unlucky; hard of hearing
3. (two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply
4. (bound form) to prepare; to equip
5. (literary) fully; completely
6. cowrie; shellfish; currency (archaic)
7. lifetime; generation; group of people; class; classifier for generations; (literary) classifier for people
8. to go against; to be contrary to; perverse; rebellious
9. barium (chemistry)
10. to dry over a fire; to bake
11. comet
12. to disobey; to stand back-to-back
13. exhausted
14. a legendary wolf; distressed; wretched
15. necklace
16. food for a journey; cakes
17. paper or cloth pasted together
18. name of a feudal state
19. to sharpen (a knife) on a stone or a strop
20. horse tack (articles of harness such as saddle and bridle)
21. to saddle a horse

biān /bian1/
1. side; edge; margin; border; boundary; simultaneously
2. to weave; to plait; to organize; to group; to arrange; to edit; to compile; to write; to compose; to fabricate; to make up

4. to stir-fry before broiling or stewing
5. a kind of otter

7. bamboo sedan chair
8. bamboo tazza used in ancient times to hold dry food for sacrifices or at banquets
9. see »biānxù«; Taiwan pr. »piān«
10. bream

biāo /biao1/
1. mark; sign; label; to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc; to bear (a brand name, registration number etc); prize; award; bid; target; quota; (old) the topmost branches of a tree; visible symptom; classifier for military units
2. (literary) very strong wind; gale
3. (bound form) wild; violent; unrestrained; furious
4. dart-like throwing weapon; goods sent under the protection of an armed escort
5. (literary) tiger stripes; (by extension) ornate and brightly colored; (by synecdoche) young tiger; (fig.) strong; stalwart
6. (old) classifier for troops
7. (usu. of livestock) fat
8. bit (of a bridle)
9. (literary) handle of a spoon or ladle; (literary) collective name for the three stars that form the handle of the Big Dipper
10. walking to and fro
11. (literary) to wave away; to discard
12. flowing of water
13. copious (of rain or snow)
14. blaze; flame flaring
15. whirlwind
16. whitlow
17. to weed
18. a horde of horses
19. hair; shaggy
biāo /biao1/
biāozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. mark; sign; label; to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc; to bear (a brand name, registration number etc); prize; award; bid; target; quota; (old) the topmost branches of a tree; visible symptom; classifier for military units
2. (literary) very strong wind; gale
3. (bound form) wild; violent; unrestrained; furious
4. dart-like throwing weapon; goods sent under the protection of an armed escort
5. (literary) tiger stripes; (by extension) ornate and brightly colored; (by synecdoche) young tiger; (fig.) strong; stalwart
6. (old) classifier for troops
7. (usu. of livestock) fat
8. bit (of a bridle)
9. (literary) handle of a spoon or ladle; (literary) collective name for the three stars that form the handle of the Big Dipper
10. walking to and fro
11. (literary) to wave away; to discard
12. flowing of water
13. copious (of rain or snow)
14. blaze; flame flaring
15. whirlwind
16. whitlow
17. to weed
18. a horde of horses
19. hair; shaggy
biāo /biao1/
biāoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. mark; sign; label; to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc; to bear (a brand name, registration number etc); prize; award; bid; target; quota; (old) the topmost branches of a tree; visible symptom; classifier for military units
2. (literary) very strong wind; gale
3. (bound form) wild; violent; unrestrained; furious
4. dart-like throwing weapon; goods sent under the protection of an armed escort
5. (literary) tiger stripes; (by extension) ornate and brightly colored; (by synecdoche) young tiger; (fig.) strong; stalwart
6. (old) classifier for troops
7. (usu. of livestock) fat
8. bit (of a bridle)
9. (literary) handle of a spoon or ladle; (literary) collective name for the three stars that form the handle of the Big Dipper
10. walking to and fro
11. (literary) to wave away; to discard
12. flowing of water
13. copious (of rain or snow)
14. blaze; flame flaring
15. whirlwind
16. whitlow
17. to weed
18. a horde of horses
19. hair; shaggy
biāo /biao1/
biāole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. mark; sign; label; to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc; to bear (a brand name, registration number etc); prize; award; bid; target; quota; (old) the topmost branches of a tree; visible symptom; classifier for military units
2. (literary) very strong wind; gale
3. (bound form) wild; violent; unrestrained; furious
4. dart-like throwing weapon; goods sent under the protection of an armed escort
5. (literary) tiger stripes; (by extension) ornate and brightly colored; (by synecdoche) young tiger; (fig.) strong; stalwart
6. (old) classifier for troops
7. (usu. of livestock) fat
8. bit (of a bridle)
9. (literary) handle of a spoon or ladle; (literary) collective name for the three stars that form the handle of the Big Dipper
10. walking to and fro
11. (literary) to wave away; to discard
12. flowing of water
13. copious (of rain or snow)
14. blaze; flame flaring
15. whirlwind
16. whitlow
17. to weed
18. a horde of horses
19. hair; shaggy

biàn /bian4/
1. to change; to become different; to transform; to vary; rebellion
2. everywhere; all over; classifier for actions: one time
3. plain; informal; suitable; convenient; opportune; to urinate or defecate; equivalent to »jiù«: then; in that case; even if; soon afterwards
4. to dispute; to debate; to argue; to discuss
5. to distinguish; to recognize
6. a braid or queue; to plait
7. hurried
8. (old) cap (garment); military officer of low rank (in former times); preceding
9. (literary) happy; delighted
10. to applaud
11. (literary) (of sunlight) bright; (literary) happy; delighted (old variant of »biàn«)
12. braid
13. skiff
14. benzyl (chemistry)
biàn /bian4/

13. skiff

biàn /bian4/

bízǔ /bi2 zu3/*
■ the earliest ancestor; originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
bǐ /bi3/
1. to compare; (followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}; ratio; to gesture; (Taiwan pr. »bì« in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
2. pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; classifier for sums of money, deals; CL: zhī, zhī
3. that; those; (one) another
4. used as phonetic bi- or pi-
5. rustic; low; base; mean; to despise; to scorn
6. to cause; to enable; phonetic bi; Taiwan pr. »bì«
7. grain not fully grown; husks; withered grain; unripe grain
8. dagger; ladle; ancient type of spoon
9. deceased mother
10. name of a river
11. facial skin disease; mange
12. bilge
bǐ /bi3/
bǐzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to compare; (followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}; ratio; to gesture; (Taiwan pr. »bì« in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
2. pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; classifier for sums of money, deals; CL: zhī, zhī
3. that; those; (one) another
4. used as phonetic bi- or pi-
5. rustic; low; base; mean; to despise; to scorn
6. to cause; to enable; phonetic bi; Taiwan pr. »bì«
7. grain not fully grown; husks; withered grain; unripe grain
8. dagger; ladle; ancient type of spoon
9. deceased mother
10. name of a river
11. facial skin disease; mange
12. bilge
bǐ /bi3/

1. round flat cake; cookie; cake; pastry; CL: zhāng
2. handle or shaft (of an axe etc); (of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem; sth that affords an advantage to an opponent; classifier for knives or blades
3. third of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; third in order; letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 165°; propyl
4. to get rid of; to put aside; to reject; to keep control; to hold (one's breath)

6. to grasp; to hold; to maintain
7. bright; brilliant; luminous
8. sad; mournful
9. handle; shaft
10. bright; glorious
11. Ikat, a type of woven silk; Kasuri
12. bright; shining, splendid
13. ancient city name; happy
14. plate
15. scabbard

bì /bi4/
1. to close; to stop up; to shut; to obstruct
2. certainly; must; will; necessarily

4. to collapse
5. to avoid; to shun; to flee; to escape; to keep away from; to leave; to hide from

bō /bo1/
1. wave; ripple; storm; surge
2. to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc; to dial; to allocate; to set aside (money); to poke (the fire); to pluck (a string instrument); to turn round; classifier: group, batch
3. (bound form) to sow (seeds); to spread (ideas, rumors etc); to broadcast (radio signals etc)
4. Taiwan pr. »bò«

9. spinach

2. mordent (music)

bó /bo2/
1. meager; slight; weak; ungenerous or unkind; frivolous; to despise; to belittle; to look down on; to approach or near
2. (bound form) abundant; plentiful; extensive; wide
3. to win; to gain
4. to play; to gamble
5. learned; well-read
6. (bound form) doctoral degree (abbr. for »bóshì«)
7. (bound form) blog (abbr. for »bókè«)
8. father's elder brother; senior; paternal elder uncle; eldest of brothers; respectful form of address; Count, third of five orders of nobility »wǔděngjuéwèi«
9. flourishing; prosperous; suddenly; abruptly
10. to fight; to combat; to seize; (of heart) to beat
11. (used for transcribing names)
12. to anchor; touch at; to moor
13. variegated; heterogeneous; to refute; to contradict; to ship by barge; a barge; a lighter (ship)
14. neck
15. platinum (chemistry)
16. shoulder; upper arm
17. cymbals
18. plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc); silkworm basket; metal foil; foil paper
19. silk
20. flail
21. ship
22. (onom.) sound of sth splitting or breaking apart; sound of an object falling to the ground; a cry of rage; Taiwan pr. »bō«
23. (dialect) mounded row of soil (in which crops are planted)
24. rafter
25. full; gushing (of fountain)
26. Heleocharis plantaginea
27. embroidered collar; expose
28. (literary) to tumble; to fall down; (literary) to fall dead
29. old term for beryllium, now written »pí«
30. ancient musical intrument shaped as a bell; hoe; spade
31. shoulder blade
32. culter, a generic term for cyprinid fish of genera Culter and Erythroculter
33. woodpidgeon
